response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting my years of dedication and investment. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this remarkable item at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to reflect the substantial value the product holds for both of us. I believe this price strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for all parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of initiating a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1200000}
